summary: Software Engineering Team Lead with 10+ years of experience in IT infrastructure consulting and operations. Proficient with Microsoft technologies (SCOM, SCCM, SCVMM, Hyper-V, Active Directory, DNS, DHCP, WINS), virtualization, and Windows clustering. Currently on assignment with Accenture Technologies in the USA, leading monitoring and infrastructure management for a US client since March 2012. Experienced in designing, implementing, and operating SCOM infrastructure, building management packs, and datacenter consolidation.

experience.title: Software Engineering Team Lead
experience.company: Avanade (on assignment to Accenture Technologies and US client)
experience.description: Onshore technical lead and SME for Microsoft System Center Operations Manager (SCOM 2012). Designed, implemented, and operated SCOM infrastructure; developed management packs using VSAE, VMPD, and Authoring Console; expanded monitoring to non-trusted domains and cross-platform servers; performed SCOM migrations (RTM to Release 2); managed daily operations, SLA reporting, and dashboards. Prior to joining monitoring, supported core IO services (AD, DNS, DHCP, WINS, File/Print), provided 24x5 remote administration for a US-based nuclear client, and led a team of 6 in shifts. Involved in decommissioning Windows 2003 domain controllers, DNS scavenging, SCCM site systems deployment, and large-scale P2V/V2V migrations for datacenter consolidation.

experience.title: IT Analyst
experience.description: Part of the messaging and collaboration team; administered internal Windows infrastructure; handled tickets escalated from 1st line support; monitored systems and SCOM alerts; performed monthly software updates; managed Active Directory operations.

experience.title: Windows Administrator
experience.description: Part of the messaging and collaboration team; administered internal Windows infrastructure; performed AD operations; handled escalations; monitored SCOM alerts; managed software updates and routine maintenance.

experience.title: Technical Support Engineer
experience.description: AD maintenance (account creation, folder access, security groups), troubleshooting mail flow issues, Outlook, and password problems; mailbox management; network devices and routers; desktop support; helped customers globally with small office networks.
